column1: He has concluded by stating that the Appellant has not proved the charges against
the  Respondent  on  a  balance  of  probabilities.  It  is  noteworthy  that  the  learned
Judge of the High Court has observed the following:

burden of proving the reasons for the dismissal is on the appellant. The standard of
